mapper.select: SELECT idx, category, task, description, familyCode, startDate, endDate, rotationPeriod, memberIdx, memberName, completionDate, status, DATEDIFF(endDate, CURDATE()) AS daysLeft FROM housework WHERE familyCode = #{familyCode} AND memberIdx = #{memberIdx} ORDER BY status ASC, idx DESC LIMIT #{startIndexNo}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM housework WHERE familyCode = #{familyCode}
AND category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchString}, '%')
AND task LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchString}, '%')
AND status LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchString}, '%')
AND memberName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchString}, '%')

SELECT memberIdx, memberName, COUNT(*) AS totalTasks, SUM(CASE WHEN status = '완료' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS completedTasks, CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN (SUM(CASE WHEN status = '완료' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)) ELSE 0 END AS progressPercentage FROM housework WHERE familyCode = #{familyCode} GROUP BY memberIdx, memberName

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalTasks, SUM(CASE WHEN status = '완료' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS completedTasks, SUM(CASE WHEN status = '진행중' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ongoingTasks, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(endDate) = CURDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS todayTasks FROM housework WHERE familyCode = #{familyCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO housework (category, task, description, familyCode, endDate, rotationPeriod, memberIdx, memberName) VALUES (#{vo.category}, #{vo.task}, #{vo.description}, #{vo.familyCode}, #{vo.endDate}, #{vo.rotationPeriod}, #{vo.memberIdx}, #{vo.memberName})
